artifact.title: Pre-Dating Readiness
artifact.subtitle: Clarify your emotional, mental, and spiritual readiness before re-entering the dating pool.

stage.label: Pre-Dating
eligibility: You are considering starting (or restarting) dating.
You want an honest readiness check and a concrete self-work plan first.

purpose: Identify readiness blockers (emotional closure, stability, integrity, life logistics).
Surface dating patterns and what to change before dating.
Translate insights into a practical preparation plan (skills, supports, boundaries).

instructions.title: Instructions
items: This is not a test and not a contract. It is a mirror.
Answer what feels true right now, not what you wish were true.
If a question feels too personal, choose 'Prefer not to say' or skip it.
If you feel flooded, pause and do something grounding (walk, breathe, pray, cold water, journaling).
If you are currently unsafe or in crisis, stop here and get support immediately (local emergency services or 988 in the U.S.).

keep_in_mind.title: Keep in Mind
items: Readiness is not perfection. It is stability + integrity + capacity to be mutually responsible.
Faith/spirituality and psychology can support each other: clarity, accountability, repair, and forgiveness are strengths, not shame triggers.
Answers can change. You can retake this after a few weeks of deliberate work.

privacy_preface.title: Privacy & Safety First
privacy_preface.text: Only share what you consent to share. You can omit details, redact names, and keep answers high-level. This is guidance and pattern-reflection, not medical or legal advice. If your answers suggest immediate danger (self-harm, abuse, stalking, threats), pause the analysis and seek real-world help now (US: call/text 988; if you are in immediate danger call your local emergency number).
